stateDiagram

SPLASH

SPLASH : SPLASH

SPLASH : enter / #123; show_splash()#59; #125;

HOME

HOME : HOME

HOME : enter / #123; show_home()#59; #125;

state MAIN_MENU {

        state "$initial_state" as MAIN_MENU.(InitialState)

        CURRENT_TIME

        CURRENT_TIME : CURRENT_TIME

        CURRENT_TIME : enter / #123; show_CURRENT_TIME()#59; #125;

        CURRENT_TIME : enter / #123; menu_at_top()#59; #125;

        MAIN_MENU__SOLAR_STATS

        MAIN_MENU__SOLAR_STATS : MAIN_MENU__SOLAR_STATS

        MAIN_MENU__SOLAR_STATS : enter / #123; show_MAIN_MENU__SOLAR_STATS()#59; #125;

        MAIN_MENU__SOLAR_STATS : enter / #123; menu_in_middle()#59; #125;

        MAIN_MENU__BATTERY_STATS

        MAIN_MENU__BATTERY_STATS : MAIN_MENU__BATTERY_STATS

        MAIN_MENU__BATTERY_STATS : enter / #123; show_MAIN_MENU__BATTERY_STATS()#59; #125;

        MAIN_MENU__BATTERY_STATS : enter / #123; menu_at_bottom()#59; #125;

        state SOLAR_STATS {

                state "$initial_state" as SOLAR_STATS.(InitialState)

                SOLAR_STATS_1

                SOLAR_STATS_1 : SOLAR_STATS_1

                SOLAR_STATS_1 : enter / #123; show_SOLAR_STATS_1()#59; #125;

                SOLAR_STATS_1 : enter / #123; menu_at_top()#59; #125;

                SOLAR_STATS__SOLAR_STATS_2

                SOLAR_STATS__SOLAR_STATS_2 : SOLAR_STATS__SOLAR_STATS_2

                SOLAR_STATS__SOLAR_STATS_2 : enter / #123; show_SOLAR_STATS__SOLAR_STATS_2()#59; #125;

                SOLAR_STATS__SOLAR_STATS_2 : enter / #123; menu_in_middle()#59; #125;

                SOLAR_STATS_3

                SOLAR_STATS_3 : SOLAR_STATS_3

                SOLAR_STATS_3 : enter / #123; show_SOLAR_STATS_3()#59; #125;

                SOLAR_STATS_3 : enter / #123; menu_at_bottom()#59; #125;

                state SOLAR_STATS_2 {

                        state "$initial_state" as SOLAR_STATS_2.(InitialState)

                        SS2_VOLTAGE

                        SS2_VOLTAGE : SS2_VOLTAGE

                        SS2_VOLTAGE : enter / #123; show_SS2_VOLTAGE()#59; #125;

                        SS2_VOLTAGE : enter / #123; menu_at_top()#59; #125;

                        SS2_CURRENT

                        SS2_CURRENT : SS2_CURRENT

                        SS2_CURRENT : enter / #123; show_SS2_CURRENT()#59; #125;

                        SS2_CURRENT : enter / #123; menu_at_bottom()#59; #125;

                }

        }

        state BATTERY_STATS {

                state "$initial_state" as BATTERY_STATS.(InitialState)

                BATTERY_STATS_1

                BATTERY_STATS_1 : BATTERY_STATS_1

                BATTERY_STATS_1 : enter / #123; show_BATTERY_STATS_1()#59; #125;

                BATTERY_STATS_1 : enter / #123; menu_at_top()#59; #125;

                BATTERY_STATS_2

                BATTERY_STATS_2 : BATTERY_STATS_2

                BATTERY_STATS_2 : enter / #123; show_BATTERY_STATS_2()#59; #125;

                BATTERY_STATS_2 : enter / #123; menu_in_middle()#59; #125;

                BATTERY_STATS_3

                BATTERY_STATS_3 : BATTERY_STATS_3

                BATTERY_STATS_3 : enter / #123; show_BATTERY_STATS_3()#59; #125;

                BATTERY_STATS_3 : enter / #123; menu_at_bottom()#59; #125;

        }

}

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

SPLASH --> HOME : RIGHT

HOME --> MAIN_MENU : RIGHT

MAIN_MENU --> HOME : LEFT

MAIN_MENU.(InitialState) --> CURRENT_TIME

CURRENT_TIME --> MAIN_MENU__SOLAR_STATS : DOWN

MAIN_MENU__SOLAR_STATS --> MAIN_MENU__BATTERY_STATS : DOWN

MAIN_MENU__SOLAR_STATS --> CURRENT_TIME : UP

MAIN_MENU__SOLAR_STATS --> SOLAR_STATS : RIGHT

MAIN_MENU__BATTERY_STATS --> MAIN_MENU__SOLAR_STATS : UP

MAIN_MENU__BATTERY_STATS --> BATTERY_STATS : RIGHT

SOLAR_STATS --> MAIN_MENU__SOLAR_STATS : LEFT

SOLAR_STATS.(InitialState) --> SOLAR_STATS_1

SOLAR_STATS_1 --> SOLAR_STATS__SOLAR_STATS_2 : DOWN

SOLAR_STATS__SOLAR_STATS_2 --> SOLAR_STATS_3 : DOWN

SOLAR_STATS__SOLAR_STATS_2 --> SOLAR_STATS_1 : UP

SOLAR_STATS__SOLAR_STATS_2 --> SOLAR_STATS_2 : RIGHT

SOLAR_STATS_3 --> SOLAR_STATS__SOLAR_STATS_2 : UP

SOLAR_STATS_2 --> SOLAR_STATS__SOLAR_STATS_2 : LEFT

SOLAR_STATS_2.(InitialState) --> SS2_VOLTAGE

SS2_VOLTAGE --> SS2_CURRENT : DOWN

SS2_CURRENT --> SS2_VOLTAGE : UP

BATTERY_STATS --> MAIN_MENU__BATTERY_STATS : LEFT

BATTERY_STATS.(InitialState) --> BATTERY_STATS_1

BATTERY_STATS_1 --> BATTERY_STATS_2 : DOWN

BATTERY_STATS_2 --> BATTERY_STATS_3 : DOWN

BATTERY_STATS_2 --> BATTERY_STATS_1 : UP

BATTERY_STATS_3 --> BATTERY_STATS_2 : UP

ROOT.(InitialState) --> SPLASH
Events
settings
